Title: Road to Ninja: Naruto the Movie
Writer: Masashi Kishimoto (manga), Masashi Kishimoto (screen story), Yuka Miyata (screenplay)
Actors: Junko Takeuchi, Chie Nakamura, Toshiyuki Morikawa, Emi Shinohara
Plot: Naruto and Sakura are captured in a parallel world by Madara, who's intentions are to steal the jinchuuriki from Naruto.
